short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Paste content from within a browser window with the power of right clicks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The pasted chrome extension allows you to copy selected content into the pasted service with a simple right click. This extension will add a submenu item which is only ever shown with a right click (ALT-Click). This submenu allows for content to be posted to the pasted service automatically giving users an easy way to shared pasted content. Once the content is posted a new tab will open with the rendered content allowing it to be easily shared on most mediums.
